title: Fishing at Teppozu
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. James B. Austin
provenance_text:
Gift of Dr. and Mrs. James B. Austin, Pittsburgh, PA
According to Dr. Austin's records, this print was purchased by Dr. Austin at auction at Sotheby & Co., London, Vever II Sale, 3/26/1975, No. 297, Lot 333, through Bluett & Son, London. However, our print does not have the Henri Vever collection mark (Lugt 1381b) visible in the reproduction of the print sold at Sotheby's.
